item.title: Doubly linked list in C: solved exercise step by step
item.description:
Solved doubly linked list in C exercise

If you were searching for a clear doubly linked list in C solved exercise, this page gives you a practical implementation with complete code and expected output.

This is one of the advanced exercises from Programming in C in 100 Solved Exercises.

Problem statement

Implement a doubly linked list where each node stores:
